articles.title: Tamannaah Bhatia raises the fashion bar in a stylish teal green cut-out dress - TOI Etimes
articles.description: Tamannaah Bhatia turns up the heat with her latest photoshoot.
articles.content: For her glam makeup, the actress opted for nude eyeshadow, mascaraed lashes, darkened brows, blushed cheeks, luminous highlighter and a shade of light pink lipstick.
